PROPERTY.DESCRIPTION: This is a mandatory tag wherein the install path of the application is to be given. If this TAG value points to an invalid or non-existent directory, then the whole program cannot run and ABORTS
Set this Flag to 1 to Enable Debugging into ${solution.folder}/LOGS/, 0 to disable.
Prompt to set to. If TAG is absent, the value defaults to 'davisql>'.
Binary Tree Page Size in Byte to set to. If TAG is absent, the value defaults to 512 Byte. Valid Range is 512 Byte to 65536 Byte. Invalid value also defaults to 512 Byte.
Binary Tree Order (Branching Factor). If TAG is absent, the value defaults to 6. Valid Range is 2 to 50. Invalid value also defaults to 6.
